app.title: Video Editor & Maker - InShot
app.description:
InShot - Powerful all-in-one Video Editor and Video Maker with professional features. Add music, text, transition effects for videos, make smooth slow motion, make video collage, blur background and etc! As an easy-to-use editing app, InShot makes creating vlogs a breeze and helps you to become an influencer on YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, WhatsApp, Facebook, etc.

InShot is also a photo editor and collage maker. Edit pictures and selfie, remove bg, add filters, adjust HSL, etc. Make stylish Instagram story covers and posts.

Features:

AI Tool
- AI Body Effects. Experience the magic of AI with instant presets that elevate your images and videos in just one tap.
- Auto Captions. AI-powered speech-to-text tool helps you say goodbye to manual text typing and makes video editing effortless.
- Auto Remove Background. Remove background of videos/photos at the touch of a button.
- Smart tracking. Make stickers/text move seamlessly in sync with your tracking object motion, adding dynamic flair to your videos.
- Smooth slow-mo. Experience seamless slow-motion effects for buttery smooth videos.

Full-featured Video Editing
- Trim/Merge clips. Combine and compress video without losing quality.
- Reverse videos.
- Add text, emoji and InShot exclusive stickers.
- Add music, sound effects & voice-overs.
- Add various-styles voice effects.
- Adjust ratio. Fit your video and photo in any aspect ratio.
- Speed control. Speed up/slow down video. Add speed ramping.
- Keyframes editing. Add custome keyframe animations.
- Chromakey. Easily edit green screen video.
- Picture-in-Picture. Create multi-layered videos.
- Mixtures. Blend your video with blend mode.
- Color picker. Pick any color on the screen and apply it to the background/text.

Filters, Effects & Transitions
- Lots of cinematic filters.
- Adjust video brightness, contrast, saturation, etc. Customized video filters and video effects.
- Unique effects such as Glitch, Fade, Noise, Beats, Weather, Retro DV, celebrate, etc.
- AI effects. Clone, stroke, auto-blur, etc.
- Pro editing app with super transitions. Combine two clips with transition effects.

Photo Editor & Collage Maker
* Blur the background easily.
* 1000+ stickers, funny memes, texts & backgrounds.
* Turn blurry photos into HD with AI Photo Enhancer. 
* Remove unwanted objects effortlessly—choose between advanced AI or quick manual tools.
* Easy-to-use photo grid collage maker. 100+ highly editable collage layouts available.
* Pic Stitch. Horizontal, vertical, or automatically recognize subtitles.

Canvas & Background
- Choose from various background patterns or upload your own pictures.
- Adjust video ratios for Instagram/TikTok/Youtube post.

Easy to Share
- Custom video export resolution, HD pro video editor support 4K 60fps export.
- Share your daily life on social media: Instagram Reels, TikTok, Whatsapp Status, YouTube Shorts, etc.

InShot is an editing app for videos and photos. With InShot - video maker with music, you can easily make basic video and even advanced assets like video collage, smooth slow motion, stop motion, reverse video and more. Share your vlogs to social media to get more likes, or edit video with music and pic for TikTok.

Any questions for InShot (FREE slow motion video editor with music & photo slideshow maker)? Please contact us at inshot.android@inshot.com

For more new feature tutorials and advanced video editing tips, please subscribe to our YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/@InShotApp

Disclaimer:
InShot is not affiliated, associated, sponsored, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, WhatsApp, Facebook, Twitter.

app.summary: AI video editor with music! Edit video with effects, slideshow & slow motion

reviews.text: Genuinely the best free editing app I've used so far. There is a subscription for certain things, but you can also watch an ad to use most things that are exclusive to subscribers. Pretty sure I'm gonna use this app for a while. One small addition would make it even better though. In the voice effects in the audio section, it'd be really nice to be able to adjust the strength of the effects, similar to the "curve" in the speed section. Other than that, it's literally perfect!

When I first started using Inshot, it took a while to understand how everything worked. Experimenting did the trick. I really love how smooth editing is and the easy layout design. my videos look flawless, and I am always really happy with the final result. There could be improvements to the text customisation, like more font options but otherwise five stars! Thank you, Inshot creators, you've done a stupendous job.

Ever since I installed InShot, I never switched from other video editing apps, why? The features are useful and practical AND they come in handy especially in long form content video creation, plus, the watermark can be REMOVED and the app can be used OFFLINE, and most importantly, the developers are open to their users' suggestions and ideas, which is important for the success of this app. I can proudly say that I've been using this app for years, and it never failed me. LIVE LAUGH LOVE INSHOT!

I really liked using InShot Video Editor—it's super user-friendly and has a lot of great features for quick, clean editing. The transitions, text options, and effects are impressive for a mobile app. However, I had to give it 4 stars instead of 5 because of the layer limitation. Not being able to use more than 4 layers really restricts creativity, especially for more complex edits. I hope future updates expand this capability. Overall, it's still one of the best mobile editors out there!

As a trial run, I subscribed for 1 year. It was totally worth the cost of a few dollars. I will renew my subscription because it enables faster video processing and, of course, no ads. This video editor is better and faster than many PC programs I've used. My one complaint is that I can't find a way to save an individual frame from my videos. Great app overall!

Best app ever I can even extract my Audio from the video I prefer. The app is my personal fav, okay? But I have a suggestion. When I import audio, it becomes a drag to find it because I have lots of other imported audios I edit with. That means I have to scroll down all the way to find the audios I wanna use. Can y'all add a search button for ALL audios, even in imported audios. It would be really helpful. Another thing... can you make the app more stable? Fix some bugs? Do a check on it? Thnx

Was 5 stars 3 years ago, now it's 4. Frequent quality updates, super easy to use, makes adding text for memes easy, the collage feature is better than some of the alternatives, has a great collection of stock music and tons of fonts. Features multi-track audio options and picture in picture. Overall it's a feature rich app. Sadly the audio gets out of sync with imported videos over 20 min. Trying to get a clip from the middle of an hour long video is difficult when the audio doesn't line up.
reviews.replyText: Hello. Sorry for the issue. We’d like to know the details of the problem you mentioned. Please send the details and the screen recording of your operation steps to us by tapping Settings - Feedback. We'll pass it along to our development team and see if there is any way we can improve it.

reviews.text: This is my go-to mobile editor app because it's simple, has a good interface and has a ton of great features. I have the lifetime pro version and it's an amazing value. However, please add a way to move frame-by-frame and easily jump to the beginning and end of any element, and make end/beginning snapping more consistent. Also, elements should stick to the clip they were placed on when clips are rearranged. Other than that, well done Inshot.

InShot is my all-time favorite app for video editing! Super easy to use, packed with powerful features, and perfect for both beginners and professionals. From trimming clips to adding music, effects, transitions, and text—everything is smooth and user-friendly. I’ve been using it for years, and it never disappoints. Highly recommended for anyone who loves creating quality content on the go!

I’m 14, and I’ve been using the InShot app for a few months now to edit my videos and photos—and honestly, it’s awesome. I don’t have any fancy editing software, but InShot gives me everything I need right on my phone. It’s super easy to use, even if you’ve never edited before.I use it mostly for making short videos for Instagram and sometimes just for fun projects. You can trim clips, add music, put not soo cool text and stickers, and even adjust the speed or add filters.

app.AIReview:
Video Editor & Maker - InShot Review

Overview

InShot is arguably the most popular mobile video editing app currently available, boasting over 790 million installs and a robust 4.84 rating. Developed by Wondershare, this application positions itself as an “all-in-one” solution for creating professional-looking videos suitable for sharing across numerous social media platforms – YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, WhatsApp, Facebook, and more. The app’s core functionality revolves around both video editing and photo manipulation, aiming to simplify the creation process for users of all skill levels, from casual vloggers to aspiring influencers. The free version offers a surprisingly comprehensive suite of tools, while premium subscription options unlock advanced features like 4K export and unlimited cloud storage.

Key Features

InShot’s feature set is impressively broad, catering to a wide range of editing needs:

  • Video Editing Tools: Users can trim, cut, merge, and rearrange clips with precision. The app supports various resolutions including 1080p, 720p, and 4K (premium feature).
  • Transition Effects: A vast library of transitions – from classic fades to more complex animations – allows for seamless video flow. These are easily applied with a single tap.
  • Music & Sound Effects: Integrated access to a royalty-free music library makes adding background tunes straightforward. Users can also import their own audio files.
  • Text & Stickers: Customizable text overlays, animated stickers, and emojis enable creative expression within videos. Font choices are plentiful, and resizing is intuitive.
  • Slow Motion & Time Warp: Capture dynamic moments with slow-motion effects and the innovative “Time Warp” feature allows for customizable speed adjustments throughout a clip.
  • Background Blur: This tool automatically blurs the background in videos, focusing attention on the subject – particularly useful for portrait videos.
  • Collage Maker: Create visually appealing collages from multiple photos or videos with various layout options and filter blending.
  • AI Features: InShot leverages AI to offer features like automatic subtitles (transcription) and background removal which are increasingly valuable in creating engaging content.

Strengths

  • Ease of Use: Despite the extensive feature set, InShot’s interface is remarkably intuitive. The drag-and-drop functionality and clear icons make it accessible even to beginners.
  • Powerful Features for Free: The core editing capabilities – trimming, cutting, transitions, music addition – are all available without any cost restrictions. This makes it an excellent entry point for users exploring video editing.
  • Cross-Platform Compatibility: InShot offers synchronization across iOS and Android devices.
  • Large Community & Support: With over 22 million active users, the app benefits from a large community forum and readily available tutorials.
  • Regular Updates: Wondershare consistently updates InShot with new features, bug fixes, and performance improvements.

Areas for Improvement

  • Watermark in Free Version: The most significant drawback of the free version is the prominent watermark that appears on exported videos. While not disruptive, it’s clearly a limitation for professional use or when sharing high-quality content.
  • Limited Export Options in Free Version: The free version restricts export resolution to 1080p and includes a cloud storage limit. Higher resolutions and unlimited exports require a premium subscription.
  • Audio Editing Limitations: While music addition is straightforward, granular audio editing (e.g., volume adjustments for specific clips) could be more refined.
  • Performance on Older Devices: Some users have reported occasional lag or performance issues when working with high-resolution videos on older smartphones – this seems to be related to processor limitations rather than the app itself.

User Experience

The user experience within InShot is generally very positive. The interface is clean, uncluttered, and responsive. Navigation is simple, allowing users to quickly access different editing tools and features. The drag-and-drop functionality for arranging clips and transitions is particularly well-executed. The app’s performance is consistently smooth on a wide range of devices, though as noted above, older devices can experience some slowdowns. The tutorial system integrated into the app is helpful for newcomers, guiding users through basic editing techniques.

Value for Money

InShot's pricing structure is tiered. The free version provides substantial value for casual users and experimentation. However, the watermark limitations become a significant barrier for those seeking professional-quality output or commercial use. The premium subscription (around $89.99 per year) removes the watermark, unlocks 4K export, provides unlimited cloud storage, and offers access to advanced features like keyframe animation. Considering the extensive feature set offered in the paid version, it represents a reasonable investment for serious video creators.

Conclusion

Video Editor & Maker – InShot is a remarkably capable mobile video editing app that deserves its prominent position in the market. Its intuitive interface, powerful features (especially within the free version), and broad compatibility make it an excellent choice for both beginners and experienced users alike. While the watermark issue in the free version remains a limitation, the overall value proposition – particularly when considering the premium subscription’s capabilities – makes InShot a highly recommended app for anyone looking to create engaging videos on their mobile device. It's a solid contender amongst the leading video editing apps and consistently delivers a polished and user-friendly experience.
